00026 public class DemoGraphScene extends GraphScene {
00027 
00028     private LayerWidget mainLayer;
00029     private LayerWidget connectionLayer;
00030     private Image image;
00031     private Image bimage;
00032    
00033     public Scene scene;
00034     
00035     public DemoGraphScene() {
00036         
00037         mainLayer = new LayerWidget(this);
00038         addChild(mainLayer);
00039         connectionLayer = new LayerWidget(this);
00040         addChild(connectionLayer);
00041         scene=this;
00042         image = Utilities.icon2Image(new ImageIcon(getClass().getResource("target.png")));
00043         bimage = Utilities.icon2Image(new ImageIcon(getClass().getResource("play_icon.gif")));
00044         addNode("Chuk");
00045         addNode("Chuk2");
00046     }
00047     
00048     public void Add(){
00049         addNode("chuck");
00050         scene.validate();
00051     }
00052     
00053     @Override
00054     protected Widget attachNodeWidget(Object arg0) {
00055         
00056         
00057         IconNodeWidget widget = new IconNodeWidget(this);
00058         widget.setImage(image);
00059         widget.setPreferredLocation(new Point(10, 20));
00060         widget.getActions().addAction(ActionFactory.createExtendedConnectAction(connectionLayer, new SceneConnectProvider()));           
00061         widget.getActions().addAction(ActionFactory.createMoveAction());           
00062         mainLayer.addChild(widget);
00063         return widget;
00064     }
00065 
00066     @Override
00067     protected Widget attachEdgeWidget(Object arg0) {
00068         return null;
00069     }
00070 
00071     @Override
00072     protected void attachEdgeSourceAnchor(Object arg0, Object arg1, Object arg2) {
00073     }
00074 
00075     @Override
00076     protected void attachEdgeTargetAnchor(Object arg0, Object arg1, Object arg2) {
00077     }

00081 class SceneConnectProvider implements ConnectProvider
00082 {
00083 
00084     public boolean isSourceWidget(Widget arg0) {
00085         return true;
00086     }
00087 
00088 
00089     public boolean hasCustomTargetWidgetResolver(Scene arg0) {
00090         return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     public Widget resolveTargetWidget(Scene arg0, Point arg1) {
00094         return null;
00095     }
00096 
00097     public void createConnection(Widget sourceWidget, Widget targetWidget) {
00098         ConnectionWidget connection = new ConnectionWidget(scene);
00099         connection.setTargetAnchorShape(AnchorShape.TRIANGLE_FILLED);
00100         connection.setSourceAnchor(AnchorFactory.createRectangularAnchor(sourceWidget));
00101         connection.setTargetAnchor(AnchorFactory.createRectangularAnchor(targetWidget));
00102         connectionLayer.addChild(connection);
00103     }
00104 
00105     public ConnectorState isTargetWidget(Widget sourceWidget, Widget targetWidget) {
00106         return sourceWidget != targetWidget && targetWidget instanceof IconNodeWidget ? ConnectorState.ACCEPT:ConnectorState.REJECT;
00107     }
